title: Track Awesome Purescript Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Purescript (passy/awesome-purescript) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curation of awesome PureScript libraries, resources and shiny things.

items.title: Awesome Purescript Updates on Feb 14, 2022
items.content_text:
### Binary Serialization

*   [purescript-arraybuffer-builder (⭐7)](https://github.com/jamesdbrock/purescript-arraybuffer-builder) - Builder for serializing ArrayBuffer
*   [purescript-parsing-dataview (⭐5)](https://github.com/jamesdbrock/purescript-parsing-dataview) - Parser for deserializing ArrayBuffer
*   [purescript-protobuf (⭐55)](https://github.com/xc-jp/purescript-protobuf) - Google Protocol Buffers
items.content_html:
Binary Serialization

  • purescript-arraybuffer-builder (⭐7) - Builder for serializing ArrayBuffer
  • purescript-parsing-dataview (⭐5) - Parser for deserializing ArrayBuffer
  • purescript-protobuf (⭐55) - Google Protocol Buffers

items.title: Awesome Purescript Updates on Mar 25, 2021
items.content_text:
### UI Libraries

*   [purescript-hedwig (⭐130)](https://github.com/utkarshkukreti/purescript-hedwig) - Hedwig is a fast, type safe, declarative PureScript library for building web applications.
*   [purescript-flame (⭐305)](https://github.com/easafe/purescript-flame) - Flame is a fast & simple framework for building web applications in PureScript inspired by purescript-hedwig and Elm
items.content_html:
UI Libraries

  • purescript-hedwig (⭐130) - Hedwig is a fast, type safe, declarative PureScript library for building web applications.
  • purescript-flame (⭐305) - Flame is a fast & simple framework for building web applications in PureScript inspired by purescript-hedwig and Elm

*   [purescript-routing-duplex (⭐94)](https://github.com/natefaubion/purescript-routing-duplex) - Simple bidirectional parser/printers for your routing data types.
items.content_html:
URL Routers

  • purescript-routing-duplex (⭐94) - Simple bidirectional parser/printers for your routing data types.

items.title: Awesome Purescript Updates on Mar 08, 2019
items.content_text:
### UI Libraries

*   [purescript-react-basic-hooks (⭐202)](https://github.com/spicydonuts/purescript-react-basic-hooks) - An alternative way to define React components using React's "hooks" APIs. Compatible with `purescript-react-basic`.
items.content_html:
UI Libraries

  • purescript-react-basic-hooks (⭐202) - An alternative way to define React components using React's "hooks" APIs. Compatible with purescript-react-basic.

items.title: Awesome Purescript Updates on Mar 07, 2019
items.content_text:
### Asynchronicity and Parallelism

*   [purescript-queue (⭐3)](https://github.com/athanclark/purescript-queue) - An asynchronous queue library for PureScript.
*   [purescript-signal (⭐260)](https://github.com/bodil/purescript-signal) - An asynchronous signal library for PureScript, similar to Elm.
*   [purescript-zeta (⭐4)](https://github.com/athanclark/purescript-zeta) - An alternative signal implementation in PureScript.

### Effect Management

*   [purescript-effect (⭐52)](https://github.com/purescript/purescript-effect) - The Effect monad, for handling native side effects in PureScript v0.12.x.

### Json Serialization

*   [purescript-argonaut (⭐63)](https://github.com/purescript-contrib/purescript-argonaut) - Json encoding and decoding typeclasses.
*   [purescript-simple-json (⭐134)](https://github.com/justinwoo/purescript-simple-json) - Json encoding and decoding through Generics.

### Binary Serialization

*   [purescript-arraybuffer (⭐7)](https://github.com/jacereda/purescript-arraybuffer) - Bindings to the ArrayBuffer JavaScript type.
*   [purescript-arraybuffer-class (⭐5)](https://github.com/athanclark/purescript-arraybuffer-class) - Typeclasses for ArrayBuffer encoding and decoding.
items.content_html:
Asynchronicity and Parallelism

  • purescript-queue (⭐3) - An asynchronous queue library for PureScript.
  • purescript-signal (⭐260) - An asynchronous signal library for PureScript, similar to Elm.
  • purescript-zeta (⭐4) - An alternative signal implementation in PureScript.

Effect Management

  • purescript-effect (⭐52) - The Effect monad, for handling native side effects in PureScript v0.12.x.

Json Serialization

  • purescript-argonaut (⭐63) - Json encoding and decoding typeclasses.
  • purescript-simple-json (⭐134) - Json encoding and decoding through Generics.

Binary Serialization

  • purescript-arraybuffer (⭐7) - Bindings to the ArrayBuffer JavaScript type.
  • purescript-arraybuffer-class (⭐5) - Typeclasses for ArrayBuffer encoding and decoding.

items.title: Awesome Purescript Updates on Apr 05, 2018
items.content_text:
### Build Tooling

*   [psc-package (⭐228)](https://github.com/purescript/psc-package) - A package manager for PureScript based on package sets

### UI Libraries

*   [purescript-css (⭐107)](https://github.com/slamdata/purescript-css) - A clean, type-safe library for describing, manipulating and rendering CSS.
*   [purescript-react (⭐406)](https://github.com/purescript-contrib/purescript-react) - React bindings for PureScript
*   [purescript-react-basic (⭐285)](https://github.com/lumihq/purescript-react-basic) - An opinionated set of bindings to the React library, optimizing for the most basic use cases.
*   [purescript-pux (⭐567)](https://github.com/alexmingoia/purescript-pux) - Build type-safe web apps with PureScript.
*   [purescript-spork (⭐155)](https://github.com/natefaubion/purescript-spork) - Elm-like for PureScript.
*   [purescript-concur (⭐272)](https://github.com/ajnsit/purescript-concur) - Concur UI framework. React backend, but can use others.
*   [purescript-presto (⭐234)](https://github.com/juspay/purescript-presto) - Write Apps like Mathematical Equations!
*   [purescript-react-explor (⭐91)](https://github.com/paf31/purescript-react-explore) - Experiments with comonads for modelling React UIs.
*   [purescript-halogen (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/slamdata/purescript-halogen) - A declarative, type-safe UI library.
*   [purescript-turbine (⭐81)](https://github.com/funkia/purescript-turbine) - Purely functional frontend framework powered by FRP.
*   [purescript-outwatch (⭐34)](https://github.com/OutWatch/purescript-outwatch) - A functional and reactive UI framework based on Rx and VirtualDom.
*   [purescript-panda (⭐69)](https://github.com/i-am-tom/purescript-panda) - What would TEA look like if we had no VDOM?
*   [purescript-specular (⭐132)](https://github.com/restaumatic/purescript-specular) - A Reflex-Dom inspired UI library for PureScript.
*   [purescript-sdom (⭐162)](https://github.com/paf31/purescript-sdom) - An experiment in replacing the virtual DOM and avoiding diffing.
*   [purescript-purview (⭐111)](https://github.com/paf31/purescript-purview) - A UI library based on the incremental lambda calculus.

### URL Routers

*   [purescript-routing (⭐105)](https://github.com/slamdata/purescript-routing) - A clean, type-safe routing library for PureScript.
*   [purescript-cofree-react-router (⭐25)](https://github.com/coot/purescript-cofree-react-router) - React-Router implemented in PureScript as Cofree Comonad for the Array functor.
*   [purescript-trout (⭐41)](https://github.com/owickstrom/purescript-trout) - Type-level routing for PureScript.
*   [purescript-boomboom (⭐5)](https://github.com/paluh/purescript-boomboom) - Never hard code your urls again. Boomboom them all!
items.content_html:
Build Tooling

  • psc-package (⭐228) - A package manager for PureScript based on package sets

UI Libraries

  • purescript-css (⭐107) - A clean, type-safe library for describing, manipulating and rendering CSS.
  • purescript-react (⭐406) - React bindings for PureScript
  • purescript-react-basic (⭐285) - An opinionated set of bindings to the React library, optimizing for the most basic use cases.
  • purescript-pux (⭐567) - Build type-safe web apps with PureScript.
  • purescript-spork (⭐155) - Elm-like for PureScript.
  • purescript-concur (⭐272) - Concur UI framework. React backend, but can use others.
  • purescript-presto (⭐234) - Write Apps like Mathematical Equations!
  • purescript-react-explor (⭐91) - Experiments with comonads for modelling React UIs.
  • purescript-halogen (⭐1.6k) - A declarative, type-safe UI library.
  • purescript-turbine (⭐81) - Purely functional frontend framework powered by FRP.
  • purescript-outwatch (⭐34) - A functional and reactive UI framework based on Rx and VirtualDom.
  • purescript-panda (⭐69) - What would TEA look like if we had no VDOM?
  • purescript-specular (⭐132) - A Reflex-Dom inspired UI library for PureScript.
  • purescript-sdom (⭐162) - An experiment in replacing the virtual DOM and avoiding diffing.
  • purescript-purview (⭐111) - A UI library based on the incremental lambda calculus.

URL Routers

  • purescript-routing (⭐105) - A clean, type-safe routing library for PureScript.
  • purescript-cofree-react-router (⭐25) - React-Router implemented in PureScript as Cofree Comonad for the Array functor.
  • purescript-trout (⭐41) - Type-level routing for PureScript.
  • purescript-boomboom (⭐5) - Never hard code your urls again. Boomboom them all!

items.title: Awesome Purescript Updates on Feb 04, 2018
items.content_text:
### Components

*   [purescript-halogen-select (⭐64)](https://github.com/citizennet/purescript-halogen-select) - Building blocks for common selection user interfaces like dropdowns, typeaheads, image pickers, and calendars.
*   [purescript-halogen-echarts (⭐8)](https://github.com/slamdata/purescript-halogen-echarts) - A Halogen integration for the popular ECharts charting library
*   [purescript-halogen-day-picker (⭐12)](https://github.com/rnons/purescript-halogen-day-picker) - A day picker for Halogen
*   [purescript-halogen-menu (⭐8)](https://github.com/slamdata/purescript-halogen-menu) - Interactive menus in Halogen
items.content_html:
Components

  • purescript-halogen-select (⭐64) - Building blocks for common selection user interfaces like dropdowns, typeaheads, image pickers, and calendars.
  • purescript-halogen-echarts (⭐8) - A Halogen integration for the popular ECharts charting library
  • purescript-halogen-day-picker (⭐12) - A day picker for Halogen
  • purescript-halogen-menu (⭐8) - Interactive menus in Halogen

items.title: Awesome Purescript Updates on Aug 29, 2015
items.content_text:
### Preludes

*   [purescript-prelude (⭐164)](https://github.com/purescript/purescript-prelude) - The standard Prelude.

### UI Libraries

*   [purescript-optic-ui (⭐122)](https://github.com/zrho/purescript-optic-ui) - Write single page web user interfaces declaratively and concisely with the help of lenses and traversals.

### Testing

*   [purescript-quickcheck (⭐105)](https://github.com/purescript/purescript-quickcheck) - An implementation of QuickCheck in PureScript.
*   [purescript-quickcheck-laws (⭐25)](https://github.com/garyb/purescript-quickcheck-laws) - Law tests for core classes.
*   [purescript-benchotron (⭐31)](https://github.com/hdgarrood/purescript-benchotron) - Straightforward benchmarking for PureScript/JavaScript.
items.content_html:
Preludes

  • purescript-prelude (⭐164) - The standard Prelude.

UI Libraries

  • purescript-optic-ui (⭐122) - Write single page web user interfaces declaratively and concisely with the help of lenses and traversals.

Testing

  • purescript-quickcheck (⭐105) - An implementation of QuickCheck in PureScript.
  • purescript-quickcheck-laws (⭐25) - Law tests for core classes.
  • purescript-benchotron (⭐31) - Straightforward benchmarking for PureScript/JavaScript.

items.title: Awesome Purescript Updates on May 07, 2015
items.content_text:
### Build Tooling

*   [pulp (⭐445)](https://github.com/bodil/pulp)
*   [grunt-purescript (⭐10)](https://github.com/purescript-contrib/grunt-purescript)
*   [gulp-purescript (⭐33)](https://github.com/purescript-contrib/gulp-purescript)
*   [purs-loader (⭐186)](https://github.com/ethul/purs-loader) for webpack

### UI Libraries

*   [purescript-thermite (⭐348)](https://github.com/paf31/purescript-thermite) - A simple wrapper for ReactJS inspired by `react-blaze`.

### Learning Resources

*   [Video - "PureScript (Maybe This Time We Get JavaScript Right)" by Bodil Stokke](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yIlDBPiMb0o)
*   [Book - "PureScript by Example" by Phil Freeman](https://leanpub.com/purescript/read)
items.content_html:
Build Tooling

  • pulp (⭐445)
  • grunt-purescript (⭐10)
  • gulp-purescript (⭐33)
  • purs-loader (⭐186) for webpack

UI Libraries

  • purescript-thermite (⭐348) - A simple wrapper for ReactJS inspired by react-blaze.

Learning Resources

  • Video - "PureScript (Maybe This Time We Get JavaScript Right)" by Bodil Stokke
  • Book - "PureScript by Example" by Phil Freeman
